column3: Data Piracy

column2: Commander, once you reach the base I'll be able to start extracting the data. It shouldn't take very long; I can't imagine their data security is very sophisticated.
column3: Commander, once you reach the base I'll be able to start extracting the data. It shouldn't take very long; I can't imagine their data security is very sophisticated.

column2: Physical security, on the other hand... I'm seeing what looks like turrets around the facility.
column3: Physical security, on the other hand... I'm seeing what looks like turrets around the facility.

column2: We should get eyes on that base before we charge in shooting. This should be a good vantage point.
column3: We should get eyes on that base before we charge in shooting. This should be a good vantage point.

column2: Aaaand... done. That's all the data, Commander. I'm ready for extraction.

column2: We've been monitoring communications traffic on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, and discerned a pattern. There's a well-defended {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} base that we suspect of being a secure data storage facility. We'd like your team to land, capture the base, and take a complete image of the contents of their databases. Once the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces realize what we're doing, they'll launch a counteroffensive, so we'll need you to stay in the field until the download is complete.

column3: Clandestine Research

column2: We're here to capture the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} research station.
column3: We're here to capture the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} research station.

column2: Let's get our forces to a position where we can better observe the enemy movements, and get eyes on the facility.
column3: Let's get our forces to a position where we can better observe the enemy movements, and get eyes on the facility.

column2: Eliminate opposition and take control of the territory, Commander.
column3: Eliminate opposition and take control of the territory, Commander.

column2: The research station is under our control, Commander.
column3: The research station is under our control, Commander.

column2: We're ready to send in the extraction ships, for you and the scientists.
column3: We're ready to send in the extraction ships, for you and the scientists.

column2: Sit tight, Commander. I think {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} will be pleased with the results.
column3: Sit tight, Commander. I think {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} will be pleased with the results.

column2: We won't be able to take this one. Pack it in, Commander.
column3: We won't be able to take this one. Pack it in, Commander.

column2: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.
column3: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.

column2: Alright, you should have good view of the research facility now.
column3: Alright, you should have good view of the research facility now.

column2: Be careful of additional forces. Reports are they have additional units in the area that are rallying back at the base. Expect contact.
column3: Be careful of additional forces. Reports are they have additional units in the area that are rallying back at the base. Expect contact.

column2: We have long suspected that there is a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} research station hidden in the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} system, and we've finally gotten wind of its possible location. We need a few brave, and plausibly deniable, mercenaries to secure the location for a dropship extraction of any valuable scientific personnel.
column3: We have long suspected that there is a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} research station hidden in the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} system, and we've finally gotten wind of its possible location. We need a few brave, and plausibly deniable, mercenaries to secure the location for a dropship extraction of any valuable scientific personnel.

column2: Lodgement
column3: Lodgement

column2: I don't like dropping dark like this. Meyer, we need some eyes on the target. Any thoughts?
column3: I don't like dropping dark like this. Meyer, we need some eyes on the target. Any thoughts?

column2: Um, let me look... Okay, this location seems like a good vantage point. You should be able to see the facility from there.
column3: Um, let me look... Okay, this location seems like a good vantage point. You should be able to see the facility from there.

column2: Roger. Commander, move up to the location Meyer indicated, and we'll make a plan from there.
column3: Roger. Commander, move up to the location Meyer indicated, and we'll make a plan from there.

column2: We're in control of the area, Commander. I'll signal to the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces to begin their landing. Good work.
column3: We're in control of the area, Commander. I'll signal to the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces to begin their landing. Good work.

column2: I'll have to signal to our employers to call off their landing. Disappointing.
column3: I'll have to signal to our employers to call off their landing. Disappointing.

column2: Bogeys on sensors!

column3: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!

column2: I'm seeing turrets powering up around the facility, boss.
column3: I'm seeing turrets powering up around the facility, boss.

column2: There's the facility, Commander. As we expected, it's heavily defended. Be cautious.
column3: There's the facility, Commander. As we expected, it's heavily defended. Be cautious.

column2: I'm seeing more 'Mech engine signatures approaching the base. Looks like there's going to be more company coming.
column3: I'm seeing more 'Mech engine signatures approaching the base. Looks like there's going to be more company coming.

column2: We're going to land in a hot AO, with no idea where we are, capture a well-defended military facility, and hold it against a counter-attack. What could go wrong?
column3: We're going to land in a hot AO, with no idea where we are, capture a well-defended military facility, and hold it against a counter-attack. What could go wrong?

column2: Commander, we're preparing a series of operations on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. However, before we can begin, we need a secure lodgement to bring military units and supplies down to the surface. We've identified a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} military facility that will be ideal for our purposes. We need you to land a strike force, capture the facility, and hold it until we can bring down our people to secure the location. Because this operation is covert and on an extremely tight schedule, you'll be inserting with no topographical intel.
column3: Commander, we're preparing a series of operations on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. However, before we can begin, we need a secure lodgement to bring military units and supplies down to the surface. We've identified a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} military facility that will be ideal for our purposes. We need you to land a strike force, capture the facility, and hold it until we can bring down our people to secure the location. Because this operation is covert and on an extremely tight schedule, you'll be inserting with no topographical intel.

column2: Capturing Production
column3: Capturing Production

column2: The manufacturing facility is just ahead, Commander.
column3: The manufacturing facility is just ahead, Commander.

column2: Before we start our attack, we should recon the facility's defenses from a defensible position.
column3: Before we start our attack, we should recon the facility's defenses from a defensible position.

column2: Once that's done, we'll move in and capture the base. Good luck, Commander.
column3: Once that's done, we'll move in and capture the base. Good luck, Commander.

column2: That's it. We've taken control of the facility, Commander.
column3: That's it. We've taken control of the facility, Commander.

column2: Given what we've seen here, I'm guessing {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} will be very pleased with our work.
column3: Given what we've seen here, I'm guessing {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} will be very pleased with our work.

column2: Doesn't seem like we're going to be able to win this one, Commander.
column3: Doesn't seem like we're going to be able to win this one, Commander.

column3: Bogeys on sensors!

column3: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.

column2: Dropship inbound for landing, Commander. Once they secure the facility, we're dusting off.
column3: Dropship inbound for landing, Commander. Once they secure the facility, we're dusting off.

column2: Commander, a word of warning, we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.
column3: Commander, a word of warning, we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.

column2: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.
column3: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.

column2: That's a Star League era manufacturing facility, all right. No wonder {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} wants it so bad.
column3: That's a Star League era manufacturing facility, all right. No wonder {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} wants it so bad.

column2: Be careful of reinforcements. We're getting intel that there are additional enemy forces rallying to the facility.
column3: Be careful of reinforcements. We're getting intel that there are additional enemy forces rallying to the facility.

column2: They haven't told us what, precisely, the facility is producing, but given the strength of enemy forces on the ground, it's something worth protecting.
column3: They haven't told us what, precisely, the facility is producing, but given the strength of enemy forces on the ground, it's something worth protecting.

To maintain the balance of power in this system, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} needs to capture this facility. You'll make a surgical strike, occupy the base, and hold it until {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces can arrive to take control.

column2: Mech Factory
column3: Mech Factory

column2: Sure enough, Commander, there's a lot of comm chatter coming from that factory.
column3: Sure enough, Commander, there's a lot of comm chatter coming from that factory.

column2: Let's move up to a good observation point and recon the facility and its defenders.
column3: Let's move up to a good observation point and recon the facility and its defenders.

column2: Once we know what we're up against, move in and take the factory, Commander. Oliveira out.
column3: Once we know what we're up against, move in and take the factory, Commander. Oliveira out.

column2: The factory is under control, Commander, and {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces are setting up defenses. Good work.
column3: The factory is under control, Commander, and {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces are setting up defenses. Good work.

column2: We won't be able to take this one. Time to pull out, Commander.
column3: We won't be able to take this one. Time to pull out, Commander.

column3: Bogeys on sensors!

column2: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.
column3: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.

column2: For an abandoned base, it's awfully lively down there, Commander.
column3: For an abandoned base, it's awfully lively down there, Commander.

column2: We're getting a report that additional {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} reinforcements have been spotted, so expect more contact.
column3: We're getting a report that additional {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} reinforcements have been spotted, so expect more contact.

column2: Embarrassing to have an enemy stealing data right out from under your nose. I'm guessing the opfor won't have had time to get any of the facility defenses online, so at least there won't be turrets.
column3: Embarrassing to have an enemy stealing data right out from under your nose. I'm guessing the opfor won't have had time to get any of the facility defenses online, so at least there won't be turrets.

column2: We picked up a coded transmission from the surface of {TGT_SYSTEM.name}: {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} scouts report a previously unknown manufacturing plant has been activated by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces, and they're broadcasting what we believe might be pre-war blueprints to an unknown recipient somewhere in the system. We need you to move in and capture that facility, intact, and protect it while we mobilize a garrison.
column3: We picked up a coded transmission from the surface of {TGT_SYSTEM.name}: {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} scouts report a previously unknown manufacturing plant has been activated by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces, and they're broadcasting what we believe might be pre-war blueprints to an unknown recipient somewhere in the system. We need you to move in and capture that facility, intact, and protect it while we mobilize a garrison.

column2: Plunder
column3: Plunder

column2: The facility where the drugs are being kept is just ahead, commander.
column3: The facility where the drugs are being kept is just ahead, commander.

column2: From here, we should be able to get eyes on the depot and a look at its defenses.
column3: From here, we should be able to get eyes on the depot and a look at its defenses.

column2: Clear out any defenders, and let's secure the place and get paid.
column3: Clear out any defenders, and let's secure the place and get paid.

column2: The base is ours, Commander. I'll notify our friends that they can move in and pick up the cargo.
column3: The base is ours, Commander. I'll notify our friends that they can move in and pick up the cargo.

column2: Looks like our friends will have to find someone else to steal the cargo for them.
column3: Looks like our friends will have to find someone else to steal the cargo for them.

column2: Bogeys on sensors!
column3: Bogeys on sensors!

column3: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!

column2: Commander, a word of warning, we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.
column3: Commander, a word of warning, we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.

column2: Given what they're keeping here, I can't say I'm surprised.
column3: Given what they're keeping here, I can't say I'm surprised.

column2: There's the facility. Looks like it's got a single lance defending it, and... confirmed, turrets.
column3: There's the facility. Looks like it's got a single lance defending it, and... confirmed, turrets.

column2: We're seeing some additional units in the region, so watch for possible reinforcements.
column3: We're seeing some additional units in the region, so watch for possible reinforcements.

column2: Spazz is a nasty, nasty drug, Commander, but not really recreational in any way. If some MechWarrior wants to burn themself out on the stuff, that's on them.
column3: Spazz is a nasty, nasty drug, Commander, but not really recreational in any way. If some MechWarrior wants to burn themself out on the stuff, that's on them.

column2: Eliminate Depot Turrets
column3: Eliminate Depot Turrets

column2: We've been following this shipment of Spazz that the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} authorities here on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} intercepted. You'd think that, given all the things they say about Spazz, they'd have torched the stuff already. But instead they've locked it up in a secure depot. I'm sure they won't mind if we take that stuff off their hands. We have much better uses for it than just blowing it all up.
column3: We've been following this shipment of Spazz that the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} authorities here on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} intercepted. You'd think that, given all the things they say about Spazz, they'd have torched the stuff already. But instead they've locked it up in a secure depot. I'm sure they won't mind if we take that stuff off their hands. We have much better uses for it than just blowing it all up.

column2: Professional Facility Management
column3: Professional Facility Management

column2: Commander, we're in the AO. I'm seeing those turrets we were promised, but no sign of the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} team that's supposed to be here.
column3: Commander, we're in the AO. I'm seeing those turrets we were promised, but no sign of the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} team that's supposed to be here.

column2: We have to assume they're out on patrol. Commander, this position should give you a decent view of the facility and the turrets. Move up and see what we're facing.
column3: We have to assume they're out on patrol. Commander, this position should give you a decent view of the facility and the turrets. Move up and see what we're facing.

column2: I could do without the giant ego that mercenary seems to carry around everywhere.
column3: I could do without the giant ego that mercenary seems to carry around everywhere.

column2: Sorry, Sumire, I don't speak Pot or Kettle.
column3: Sorry, Sumire, I don't speak Pot or Kettle.

column2: Well, that was a lot more exciting than we bargained for.
column3: Well, that was a lot more exciting than we bargained for.

column2: Bogeys on sensors!
column3: Bogeys on sensors!

column2: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
column3: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.

column2: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
column3: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.

column2: Heads up, Commander; dropship inbound.
column3: Heads up, Commander; dropship inbound.

column2: Getting an active ping from the turrets. I'm going to get some altitude so I don't get any more bullet holes in my Leopard.
column3: Getting an active ping from the turrets. I'm going to get some altitude so I don't get any more bullet holes in my Leopard.

column2: We need to clear those turrets out if we're going to hold the base, Commander.
column3: We need to clear those turrets out if we're going to hold the base, Commander.

column2: There's the facility. Still no sign of the opfor, Meyer?
column3: There's the facility. Still no sign of the opfor, Meyer?

column2: I... Yeah, I've got something. Multiple engine signatures. 'Mechs, inbound to your location.
column3: I... Yeah, I've got something. Multiple engine signatures. 'Mechs, inbound to your location.

column2: Ah. I prefer opposition that isn't the usual local idiots. Are you local idiots? I suppose we'll find out.
column3: Ah. I prefer opposition that isn't the usual local idiots. Are you local idiots? I suppose we'll find out.

column2: Ha! You must be the janitor they sent to turn the lights back on.
column3: Ha! You must be the janitor they sent to turn the lights back on.

column2: I prefer to think of myself as a facility management professional.
column3: I prefer to think of myself as a facility management professional.

column2: Turrets always make things more complicated, but this seems like a pretty routine operation, Commander.
column3: Turrets always make things more complicated, but this seems like a pretty routine operation, Commander.

column3: Eliminate Base Turrets

column2: Fifteen years ago we lost track of a facility here on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, and {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} intelligence believed it had been permanently shut down. A month ago, an orbiting spy satellite picked up signs that the facility had been brought back online. Our current guess is that a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} team was dispatched to bring the base back up to operational capacity. We'd rather not have sensitive radar backed by armed turrets and flak batteries aimed at the skies of {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. We'd like you to clear their team out and hold the facility while our own people land to scour it for useful intel.
column3: Fifteen years ago we lost track of a facility here on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, and {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} intelligence believed it had been permanently shut down. A month ago, an orbiting spy satellite picked up signs that the facility had been brought back online. Our current guess is that a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} team was dispatched to bring the base back up to operational capacity. We'd rather not have sensitive radar backed by armed turrets and flak batteries aimed at the skies of {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. We'd like you to clear their team out and hold the facility while our own people land to scour it for useful intel.

column2: Pulling Linchpins
column3: Pulling Linchpins

column2: We're here to capture the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} military Outpost.
column3: We're here to capture the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} military Outpost.

column2: Let's get our forces to a position where we can better observe the enemy movements, and perhaps get eye on the facility.
column3: Let's get our forces to a position where we can better observe the enemy movements, and perhaps get eye on the facility.

column2: Eliminate opposition and take control of the territory, Commander.
column3: Eliminate opposition and take control of the territory, Commander.

column2: The Outpost is under our control, Commander.
column3: The Outpost is under our control, Commander.

column2: We're ready to send in the extraction ships.
column3: We're ready to send in the extraction ships.

column2: Sit tight. {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} should be pleased with the results.
column3: Sit tight. {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} should be pleased with the results.

column2: We won't be able to take this one. Pack it in, Commander.
column3: We won't be able to take this one. Pack it in, Commander.

column3: Commander, a word of warning, we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.

column2: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.
column3: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.

column2: Alright, you should have good view of the Outpost now.
column3: Alright, you should have good view of the Outpost now.

column2: Be careful of additional forces inbound. Our employer says they softened up them up a bit, but now they're rallying back at the Outpost. Expect contact.
column3: Be careful of additional forces inbound. Our employer says they softened up them up a bit, but now they're rallying back at the Outpost. Expect contact.

column2: Commander, the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} plan is sound, as long as we're okay with intentionally setting up an ambush on ourselves.

column2: We've recently discovered a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} military outpost in an extremely inconvenient location, strangling trade and movement for our personnel in the area. Your mission: eliminate enemy defenses, then capture and hold the base long enough for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces to take possession. We'll support your action by drawing off some of the defenders ahead of time, so if these units retreat to the base, they'll already be weakened by our troops.
column3: We've recently discovered a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} military outpost in an extremely inconvenient location, strangling trade and movement for our personnel in the area. Your mission: eliminate enemy defenses, then capture and hold the base long enough for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces to take possession. We'll support your action by drawing off some of the defenders ahead of time, so if these units retreat to the base, they'll already be weakened by our troops.

column3: Steal the Prototype

column2: Commander, this is the location provided by our employers.
column3: Commander, this is the location provided by our employers.

column2: Let's get our forces to a position where we can better observe the enemy movements, and get eyes on the base.
column3: Let's get our forces to a position where we can better observe the enemy movements, and get eyes on the base.

column2: Once we have a better picture of the situation, eliminate any defending forces and move into the base.
column3: Once we have a better picture of the situation, eliminate any defending forces and move into the base.

column2: The Research Facility is ours, Commander; {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} will be pleased to have this prototype in their hands.
column3: The Research Facility is ours, Commander; {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} will be pleased to have this prototype in their hands.

column2: We're picking up additional units in the area that are rallying to engage you. So keep your eyes open.
column3: We're picking up additional units in the area that are rallying to engage you. So keep your eyes open.

column2: Commander, I expect the defenses on the facility to be substantial. But if we were bothered by the odds, we wouldn't be mercenaries.

column2: We've learned that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} here in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} has been busy working on a new water filtration technology, which is both extremely valuable and likely to shift the balance of power in the region by opening up more worlds for colonization. We've discovered where they're working on the latest prototype. We know that they are monitoring the location of our own 'Mechs in the area, so we need a mercenary lance to make the vanguard assault and catch them by surprise. We'll then take over the facility with {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces.
column3: We've learned that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} here in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} has been busy working on a new water filtration technology, which is both extremely valuable and likely to shift the balance of power in the region by opening up more worlds for colonization. We've discovered where they're working on the latest prototype. We know that they are monitoring the location of our own 'Mechs in the area, so we need a mercenary lance to make the vanguard assault and catch them by surprise. We'll then take over the facility with {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces.

column2: Covert Surveillance
column3: Covert Surveillance

column2: These are the coordinates we received from {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} intelligence.
column3: These are the coordinates we received from {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} intelligence.

column2: Move into position to survey the outpost, and let's figure out what we're dealing with here.
column3: Move into position to survey the outpost, and let's figure out what we're dealing with here.

column2: Good luck, Commander. Oliveira out.
column3: Good luck, Commander. Oliveira out.

column2: The outpost is ours, Commander. Our employer has agents inbound to take possession of the data archives.
column3: The outpost is ours, Commander. Our employer has agents inbound to take possession of the data archives.

column2: I think we're done here, Commander. What a mess.
column3: I think we're done here, Commander. What a mess.

column2: Bogeys on sensors!
column3: Bogeys on sensors!

column2: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.

column3: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.

column2: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
column3: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!

column2: Commander, bad news. We're seeing energy signatures for fixed defenses powering up.
column3: Commander, bad news. We're seeing energy signatures for fixed defenses powering up.

column2: Turrets. Remember they can spot you from a very long way off, Commander.
column3: Turrets. Remember they can spot you from a very long way off, Commander.

column2: Sure enough, that facility isn't abandoned at all. We need to sweep it for hostiles and clear them out.
column3: Sure enough, that facility isn't abandoned at all. We need to sweep it for hostiles and clear them out.

column2: Remember there may be more enemy units in the field, so stay alert.
column3: Remember there may be more enemy units in the field, so stay alert.

column2: How relevant can intel from the ass end of nowhere really be? We're still being paid, so I suppose it doesn't matter, honestly.
column3: How relevant can intel from the ass end of nowhere really be? We're still being paid, so I suppose it doesn't matter, honestly.

column2: Unremarkable, empty systems like this one are the perfect location for covert intelligence gathering operations. We believe there's a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} facility here on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name} doing exactly that. Monitoring the pattern of DropShips making landings on the planet has led {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} analysts to a remote, apparently empty facility. Until just a few days ago, when we picked up the unmasked signature of a 'Mech's fusion engine powering up. That facility isn't empty, and we want the data stored there.
column3: Unremarkable, empty systems like this one are the perfect location for covert intelligence gathering operations. We believe there's a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} facility here on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name} doing exactly that. Monitoring the pattern of DropShips making landings on the planet has led {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} analysts to a remote, apparently empty facility. Until just a few days ago, when we picked up the unmasked signature of a 'Mech's fusion engine powering up. That facility isn't empty, and we want the data stored there.

column2: Synthetic Plague
column3: Synthetic Plague

column2: We're in the AO, Commander. My skin is crawling just thinking about what's out here.
column3: We're in the AO, Commander. My skin is crawling just thinking about what's out here.

column2: Advance to a good recon position and let's see who's guarding that site.
column3: Advance to a good recon position and let's see who's guarding that site.

column2: Oh, and Commander? Don't bring me any souvenirs, okay? Oliveira out.
column3: Oh, and Commander? Don't bring me any souvenirs, okay? Oliveira out.

column2: The disposal team is inbound, Commander. Let's get the hell out of here before our luck changes.
column3: The disposal team is inbound, Commander. Let's get the hell out of here before our luck changes.

column2: We'll need to have a serious debriefing after this one, Commander.
column3: We'll need to have a serious debriefing after this one, Commander.

column2: Bogeys on sensors!
column3: Bogeys on sensors!

column2: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.

column3: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.

column2: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
column3: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!

column2: There's active fixed defenses in there, Commander. They really don't want us taking this site.
column3: There's active fixed defenses in there, Commander. They really don't want us taking this site.

column2: At least turrets are easy to outmaneuver. Remember they'll spot you for other units, Commander.
column3: At least turrets are easy to outmaneuver. Remember they'll spot you for other units, Commander.

column2: That's a lot of defense for a supposedly empty facility. I have a bad feeling that our employers are right about this place.
column3: That's a lot of defense for a supposedly empty facility. I have a bad feeling that our employers are right about this place.

column2: I'd expect at least one lance of reinforcements in the field, sweeping for intruders. Meaning us.
column3: I'd expect at least one lance of reinforcements in the field, sweeping for intruders. Meaning us.

column2: I'll ask the obvious question: how do we know they won't just keep the bioweapons for themselves? Then again, if we second guessed every job, we'd be broke.
column3: I'll ask the obvious question: how do we know they won't just keep the bioweapons for themselves? Then again, if we second guessed every job, we'd be broke.

column2: We've got a developing situation, Commander, and we need immediate aid from a reliable mercenary company. A covert {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} team was investigating reports of a cache of bioweapons on an otherwise abandoned world. We've tracked down four of these caches in the Periphery over the last 20 years, and disposed of them safely. The team was about to signal for an extraction when their signal went dead. We have reason to believe that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces have taken control of the cache site, and eliminated our covert team. We need you to take that site and signal our disposal team.
